From: Lawren.Freebody@salata.com (Lawren Freebody) In a food processor, combine frozen bananas with remaining ingredients. Using a steel blade, process until smooth. Divide into 4 individual serving bowls and serve right away. "As rich as ice cream and as smooth as frozen custard, this dessert is a real prize."
Each serving provides 109 calories, 4 g protein, 3 g fat, 18 g carboydrate, 39 mg sodium, 10 mg cholesteral.
SOURCE: "Lean and Luscious and Meatless" by Bobbie Hinman & Millie Snyder <typed for you by Lawren Freebody @ Salata BBS>
